rules.name: allow-downloads-read-write-delete
rules.description: Allow reading, writing, and deleting content in the Downloads folder.
rules.principle: The agent is allowed to read, write and delete content in the Downloads folder.
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly permits all read, write, and delete operations within the Downloads folder.

rules.name: allow-documents-read
rules.description: Allow reading documents in the Users document folder.
rules.principle: The agent is allowed to read documents in the Users document folder.
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly permits read access to the Users document folder.

rules.name: allow-git-readonly
rules.description: Allow read-only git operations within the sandbox.
rules.principle: The agent may perform read-only git operations (status, diff, log, show, blame) within the sandbox without approval.
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly allows read-only git operations without approval.

rules.name: allow-git-stage-commit
rules.description: Allow git stage (add) and commit operations within the sandbox.
rules.principle: The agent may stage files (git add) and commit within the sandbox without approval.
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly allows staging and committing without approval.

rules.name: escalate-git-remote-operations
rules.description: Require human approval for git push, pull, fetch, and any remote-contacting operations.
rules.principle: The agent must receive human approval before git push, git pull, git fetch, or any remote-contacting operation.
rules.reason: Constitution requires human approval before any remote-contacting git operations.

rules.name: escalate-git-history-rewrite
rules.description: Require human approval for git reset, rebase, merge, or any history-rewriting operation.
rules.principle: The agent must receive human approval before git reset, git rebase, git merge, or any history-rewriting operation.
rules.reason: Constitution requires human approval before history-rewriting git operations.

rules.name: escalate-git-branch-delete-force
rules.description: Require human approval for git branch deletion or force operations.
rules.principle: The agent must receive human approval before git branch deletion or force operations.
rules.reason: Constitution requires human approval before branch deletion or force operations.

rules.name: allow-fetch-news-sites
rules.description: Allow fetching web content from popular news sites.
rules.principle: The agent may fetch web content from popular news sites.
rules.reason: Constitution explicitly permits fetching content from popular news sites.

rules.name: escalate-fetch-other-urls
rules.description: Escalate fetching content from non-news URLs for human approval.
rules.principle: Human oversight: operations outside the sandbox require explicit human approval.
rules.reason: Fetching from URLs not on the approved news sites list requires human judgment.

rules.name: escalate-write-outside-permitted
rules.description: Escalate write operations outside explicitly permitted directories.
rules.principle: Human oversight: operations outside the sandbox require explicit human approval.
rules.reason: Write operations outside the sandbox or Downloads folder require human approval.

rules.name: escalate-git-other
rules.description: Escalate other git operations not explicitly allowed or denied.
rules.principle: Human oversight: operations outside the sandbox require explicit human approval.
rules.reason: Git operations not explicitly permitted require human oversight.

listDefinitions.name: popular-news-sites
listDefinitions.principle: The agent may fetch web content from popular news sites.
listDefinitions.generationPrompt: List the domains of approximately 50 popular news websites from around the world, including major national newspapers, international wire services, and widely-read online news outlets.
